author: Special Correspondent
text:
M. Vinoth (27) of Karur district has sought police protection and steps for reunion with his beloved, Priyanka, who belonged to another caste.

In a petition to Superintendent of Police Rajeswari, Vinoth alleged that Priyanka’s parents and relatives were against the marriage. They were reportedly beating Priyanka up and threatening her, he added.

Vinoth expressed his apprehension that her parents would resort to honour killing of Priyanka, and sought the intervention of the police.

The SP said that she had not received any complaint from Priyanka’s parents.
title: Youth seeks protection, reunion with his beloved
